Uses of Class
asciipanel.AsciiPainter

Packages that use AsciiPainter
Package Description
asciipanel  
imageeditor  

  • Uses of AsciiPainter in asciipanel

    Methods in asciipanel that return AsciiPainter
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    AsciiPainter AsciiPainter.background​(java.awt.Color color)
    Sets the background color to be used for painting.
    AsciiPainter AsciiPanelModel.beginPaint()
    Obtains a painter that paints to the current raster.
    AsciiPainter AsciiPainter.brush​(AsciiBrush brush)
    Sets the brush to be used for drawing lines.
    AsciiPainter AsciiPainter.clear()
    Clear the entire surface to whatever the default background color is.
    AsciiPainter AsciiPainter.clear​(char character)
    Clear the entire surface with the specified character and whatever the default foreground and background colors are.
    AsciiPainter AsciiPainter.drawDot()
    Draws a single dot with the active brush at the pen's position.
    AsciiPainter AsciiPainter.drawLine​(int deltaX, int deltaY)
    Draws a line with the active brush from the pen's position to (penX + deltaX, penY + deltaY).
    AsciiPainter AsciiPainter.drawLineTo​(int endX, int endY)
    Draws a line with the active brush from the pen's position to (endX, endY).
    AsciiPainter AsciiPainter.drawRaster​(AsciiRaster raster, boolean transparent, boolean center)
    Draws a given raster into the surface, with optional transparency.
    AsciiPainter AsciiPainter.drawRasterChars​(AsciiRaster raster, boolean transparent, boolean center)
    Draws characters from a given raster into the surface, with optional transparency.
    AsciiPainter AsciiPainter.fill​(char character)
    Runs a flood-fill algorithm starting from the position of the pen, filling a contiguous area of the surface with the specified character and current background and foreground colors.
    AsciiPainter AsciiPainter.fillRect​(char character, int width, int height)
    Fills an axis-aligned rectangle with the specified character, width and height and current background and foreground colors.
    AsciiPainter AsciiPainter.fillRectTo​(char character, int endX, int endY)
    Fills an axis-aligned rectangle with the specified character and current background and foreground colors.
    AsciiPainter AsciiPainter.foreground​(java.awt.Color color)
    Sets the foreground color to be used for painting.
    AsciiPainter AsciiPainter.move​(int deltaX, int deltaY)
    Move the pen position by a given offset.
    AsciiPainter AsciiPainter.moveTo​(int penX, int penY)
    Changes the pen position to the specified coordinates.
    AsciiPainter AsciiPainter.write​(char character)
    Write a character to the pen's position.
    AsciiPainter AsciiPainter.write​(java.lang.String string)
    Write a string to the pen's position.
    AsciiPainter AsciiPainter.writeCenter​(java.lang.String string)
    Write a string to the center of the panel at the vertical position of the pen.
    Methods in asciipanel with parameters of type AsciiPainter
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    protected abstract void LinearBrush.dot​(AsciiPainter painter, int x, int y)
    Subclasses must implement this method to draw each point on the line.
    void AsciiPanelModel.endPaint​(AsciiPainter painter)
    Notifies observer of changes made with the specified painter
    void AsciiBrush.stroke​(AsciiPainter painter, int fromX, int fromY, int toX, int toY)
    Implementations must draw a line into the painter's surface from the point (fromX, fromY) to the point (toX, toY).
    void LinearBrush.stroke​(AsciiPainter painter, int fromX, int fromY, int toX, int toY)
    Draws a line by applying the abstract method dot to each point on the line.

  • Uses of AsciiPainter in imageeditor

    Methods in imageeditor that return AsciiPainter
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    AsciiPainter EditorStateModel.beginPaint()
    Obtains a painter that paints to the current raster.
    AsciiPainter EditorStateModel.beginUndoablePaint()
    Inserts a new entry into the undo stack, then obtains a painter that paints to the current raster.
    Methods in imageeditor with parameters of type AsciiPainter
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    protected void CharacterBrush.dot​(AsciiPainter painter, int x, int y)
    Writes the character specified at construction at the point specified by arguments, using foreground and background colors of the provided painter.
    protected void EraserBrush.dot​(AsciiPainter painter, int x, int y)
    Replaces the character at the specified point with a space.
    void EditorStateModel.endPaint​(AsciiPainter painter)
    Notifies main panel model of changes made with the specified painter
